scripts.migrate:staging: PRIVATE_KEY=$(aws secretsmanager get-secret-value --secret-id staging/wallet --query 'SecretString' | jq 'fromjson.tezosPrivateKey') node ./scripts/originate.js
scripts.transfer:staging: PUBLIC_ADDRESS=$(aws secretsmanager get-secret-value --secret-id staging/wallet --query 'SecretString' | jq 'fromjson.tezosPublicAddress') node ./scripts/transfer.js
